OnFinishedPlaying: Event called whenever a non-looping flipbook finishes playing (either reaching the beginning or the end, depending on the play direction)

methods.name: GetFlipbook
methods.doc: Gets the flipbook used by this instance.

methods.name: GetFlipbookFramerate
methods.doc: Get the nominal framerate that the flipbook will be played back at (ignoring PlayRate), in frames per second

methods.name: GetFlipbookLength
methods.doc: Get length of the flipbook (in seconds)

methods.name: GetFlipbookLengthInFrames
methods.doc: Get length of the flipbook (in frames)

methods.name: GetPlaybackPosition
methods.doc: Get the current playback position (in seconds) of the flipbook

methods.name: GetPlaybackPositionInFrames
methods.doc: Get the current playback position (in frames) of the flipbook

methods.name: GetPlayRate
methods.doc: Get the current play rate for this flipbook

methods.name: GetSpriteColor
methods.doc: Returns the current color of the sprite

methods.name: IsLooping
methods.doc: Get whether we are looping or not

methods.name: IsPlaying
methods.doc: Get whether this flipbook is playing or not.

methods.name: IsReversing
methods.doc: Get whether we are reversing or not

methods.name: Play
methods.doc: Start playback of flipbook

methods.name: PlayFromStart
methods.doc: Start playback of flipbook from the start

methods.name: Reverse
methods.doc: Start playback of flipbook in reverse

methods.name: ReverseFromEnd
methods.doc: Start playback of flipbook in reverse from the end

methods.name: SetFlipbook
methods.doc: Change the flipbook used by this instance (will reset the play time to 0 if it is a new flipbook).

methods.name: SetLooping
methods.doc: true means we should loop, false means we should not.

methods.name: SetNewTime
methods.doc: Set the new playback position time to use

methods.name: SetPlaybackPosition
methods.doc: Jump to a position in the flipbook (expressed in seconds). If bFireEvents is true, event functions will fire, otherwise they will not.

methods.name: SetPlaybackPositionInFrames
methods.doc: Jump to a position in the flipbook (expressed in frames). If bFireEvents is true, event functions will fire, otherwise they will not.

methods.name: SetPlayRate
methods.doc: Sets the new play rate for this flipbook

methods.name: SetSpriteColor
methods.doc: Set color of the sprite

methods.name: Stop
methods.doc: Stop playback of flipbook
